Goodwater Capital

We invest in consumer technology startups.

01

We fund companies
with powerful potential,
giving entrepreneurs the resources and wisdom to drive remarkable growth.

The Goodwater Approach

We have spent more than 40 years investing in leading consumer technology companies across the globe.

From housing to healthcare, food delivery to financial services, education to entertainment and more, we're investing in the world’s most promising entrepreneurs to solve the world’s most pressing problems. As a combined force, Goodwater companies are a global force for change, poised to measurably improve billions of lives.

Our Investment Approach

Our portfolio isn’t a pipeline, seeking to extract value as companies pass through.

Instead, we view it as a cycle, built to provide ongoing support that nourishes sustainable, mutually-beneficial growth over the lifecycle of the business.

01

Seek out promising consumer tech companies

We don’t hear thousands of pitches per year. We find and invest in just a handful of great companies.

02

Make $5M to $50M investments

We support companies from Series A to IPO.

03

Provide software, data, services, and support

We provide entrepreneurs with detailed data, concierge services, start-up curriculum, and strategic advice.

04

Make capital investments

We specialize 100% in consumer tech. And nothing else.

That singular focus means we know more about your business, your competition, and the pathways to success than any other investor.

05

Reinvest wisdom and resources

We don’t hear thousands of pitches per year. We find and invest in just a handful of great companies.

Global Reach

Life-changing companies and ideas can come from anyone, anywhere.

Our portfolio companies deliver world-changing products and services to billions of people around the world. Our software-enabled approach identifies breakout companies early, and allows us to support companies from seed to IPO.

Our Portfolio

We invest in companies across a broad spectrum of stages, places, and industries.

But there’s one thing they all have in common: they all offer products or services that can change lives for the better.
